TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAuthenticationModule

summary.span: 提供 Web 用戶端驗證模組的基底驗證介面。

span.span: Provides the base authentication interface for Web client authentication modules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面定義的屬性和自訂驗證模組必須使用的方法。The interface defines the properties and methods that custom authentication modules must use. 驗證模組進行整個驗證程序，利用的伺服器，來為適當的驗證挑戰回應。Authentication modules conduct the entire authentication process with a server, responding to an authentication challenge as appropriate. 此程序可能包含要求以不同於資源伺服器，以及正確的要求驗證 uri 所需的任何其他活動的驗證伺服器。This process may consist of requests to an authentication server separate from the resource server, as well as any other activities required to properly authenticate a request for a URI. 自訂驗證模組應該實作介面，並再向方法。Custom authentication modules should implement the interface and then register with the method. 藉由讀取組態檔，驗證模組也會登錄在程式初始化時。Authentication modules are also registered at program initialization by reading the configuration file. ## Examples 下列範例會建立會建立自訂的驗證類別，藉由實作介面。The following example creates creates a customized authentication class by implementing the interface. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Authorization Authenticate (string challenge, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.Authorization Authenticate(string challenge, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Function Authenticate (challenge As String, request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: System::Net::Authorization ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ challenge, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
abstract member Authenticate : string * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

param.name: challenge
param.span: 伺服器所傳送的驗證要求。

span.span: The authentication challenge sent by the server.
The instance associated with the challenge.
The credentials associated with the challenge.

summary.span: 傳回 類別的執行個體以回應來自伺服器的驗證要求。

span.span: Returns an instance of the class in respose to an authentication challenge from a server.

returns.span: 執行個體，含有要求的授權訊息，或者如果無法處理要求時，則為 。

span.span: An instance containing the authorization message for the request, or if the challenge cannot be handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法進行驗證程序與伺服器，並傳回執行個體。The method conducts the authentication process with the server and returns an instance to the . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#3)]

span.para: 呼叫方法中的已註冊的驗證模組，以判斷哪一個模組會處理所面臨的挑戰。如果驗證模組無法處理所面臨的挑戰方法必須傳回。如果驗證模組進行驗證程序時遇到錯誤一定會擲回例外狀況。

The calls the method on registered authentication modules to determine which module handles the challenge. If the authentication module cannot handle the challenge, the method must return . If the authentication module encounters an error while conducting the authentication process, must throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public string AuthenticationType { get; }
.property instance string AuthenticationType
Public ReadOnly Property AuthenticationType As String
public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string

summary.span: 取得這個驗證模組所提供的驗證型別。

span.span: Gets the authentication type provided by this authentication module.

value.span: 字串，指出這個驗證模組所提供的驗證型別。

span.span: A string indicating the authentication type provided by this authentication module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別這個驗證模組所實作的驗證類型。The property identifies the authentication type implemented by this authentication module. 屬性由方法來判斷如果已註冊的驗證模組，並根據方法來移除已註冊的驗證模組。The property is used by the method to determine if the authentication module has been registered, and by the method to remove a registered authentication module. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CanPreAuthenticate { get; }
.property instance bool CanPreAuthenticate
Public ReadOnly Property CanPreAuthenticate As Boolean
public: property bool CanPreAuthenticate { bool get(); };
member this.CanPreAuthenticate : bool

summary.span: 取得值，指出驗證模組是否支援預先驗證。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the authentication module supports preauthentication.

value.span: 如果授權模組支援預先驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the authorization module supports preauthentication; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`true`表示驗證模組可以回應的有效執行個體時呼叫方法。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the authentication module can respond with a valid instance when the method is called. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#7)]

span.para: 這通常是固定的值;請驗證模組可以預先驗證，或它不能。
This is typically a fixed value; either the authentication module can preauthenticate, or it cannot.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Authorization PreAuthenticate (System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);

Public Function PreAuthenticate (request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: System::Net::Authorization ^ PreAuthenticate(System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
abstract member PreAuthenticate : System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

param.name: request
param.span: 與驗證要求相關的 執行個體。

span.span: The instance associated with the authentication request.

param.name: credentials
param.span: 與驗證要求相關的認證。

span.span: The credentials associated with the authentication request.

summary.span: 傳回驗證要求的 類別的執行個體至伺服器。

span.span: Returns an instance of the class for an authentication request to a server.

returns.span: 執行個體，含有要求的授權訊息。

span.span: An instance containing the authorization message for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，則方法會傳回的執行個體內含驗證訊息的類別。When the property is `true`, the method will return an instance of the class containing an authentication message. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 如需完整範例，請參閱類別。For a complete example refer to the class.
